title: Calculating Function
description:
For a positive integer n let's define a function f:
f(n) =  - 1 + 2 - 3 + .. + ( - 1)nn
Your task is to calculate f(n) for a given integer n.
input_specification: The single line contains the positive integer n (1 ≤ n ≤ 1015).
output_specification: Print f(n) in a single line.
